description:
Like all the other samurai, Chopper is discouraged by the news of Luffy’s loss and Queen doesn’t miss the chance to finish him off! Meanwhile, Kin’emon fights for his life to save Momonosuke and that motivates Momonosuke to rise up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fight Against the Dark Night - The Commander-in-Chief of the Land of Wano Sounds Off
Résistez dans la nuit noire. Le cri du généralissime de Wano !
Widerstand in finsterer Nacht – Der Oberbefehlshaber Wano-Lands ergreift das Wort
Yamiyo ni Aragae: Wano Kuni Soudaishou Hoeru
Борьба в темноте ночи! Слова главнокомандующего страны Вано!
قتالُ اللّيلة المظلمة، صرخة قائد قوّات وانو
闇夜に抗え ワノ国総大将吠える
